name: PD Drums test
description:
Just a test for now
A very simple drum kit all/toy for playing live on playdate.
only a nigh s work so dont expect much

Controlls:
Left = snare
Right = base tom
Up = high tom
Down = kick
A =  crash
B = high hat, tilt left for close, right for open

PD Drum 2 also added a crank for random tom noises

Sound samples from the playdate SDK 
Art and Code by Alastair Low / Lowtek Games

Bonus:
There is a really good drum sequencer in the playdate sdk examples but noone has shared it as far as im aware.
Il add it here too but if anyone has any issue with this from panic, il remove it and link it somewhere else no attahced to PD drums.
To reiterate I did not make the sdk example file but just want to share fir visibility
